block.p: Marisa Folger Simpson and Jason Fisher were married last evening at the Foundry, an event space in Long Island City, Queens. Curt Collier, the leader of the Riverdale-Yonkers Society for Ethical Culture, officiated.

The bride, 33, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a freelance documentary television and film editor based in Brooklyn. She graduated from the University of Texas and received a Master of Fine Arts degree in creative writing from the University of New Orleans.

Marisa Folger Simpson and Jason Fisher were married last evening at the Foundry, an event space in Long Island City, Queens. Curt Collier, the leader of the Riverdale-Yonkers Society for Ethical Culture, officiated.

Marisa Folger Simpson and Jason Fisher were married last evening at the Foundry, an event space in Long Island City, Queens. Curt Collier, the leader of the Riverdale-Yonkers Society for Ethical Culture, officiated.

The bride, 33, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a freelance documentary television and film editor based in Brooklyn. She graduated from the University of Texas and received a Master of Fine Arts degree in creative writing from the University of New Orleans.

The bride is a daughter of Emily F. Simpson and William F. Simpson of Bronxville, N.Y. Her father is the superintendent of the Lavelle School for the Blind in the Bronx. Her mother is a freelance speech pathologist in Bronxville.

The bridegroom, 35, is an actor in Brooklyn. Last year he performed the title role in ''Lenny Bruce: In His Own Words,'' a one-man off Broadway play at the Zipper Theater in Manhattan. He also appears in television commercials. He graduated from Columbia and received a Master of Fine Arts in acting from the American Repertory Theater's Institute for Advanced Theater Training at Harvard.

He is a son of Neila D. Fisher and Lawrence B. Fisher of Manhattan. His mother is a watercolorist. His father, who is retired, was a partner in the Manhattan office of Orrick, Herrington & Sutcliffe, the law firm.
